      Get a specified Chord.
      Chord Composer.n(int... notes)
      Create a note or notes chosen from the composer's Scale.
      Chord Composer.xn(int octave, Chord orig)

      Methods in io.github.daveho.funwithsound with parameters of type Chord 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Melody.add(Chord chord)
      Append a Chord to the melody.
      Melody Composer.rm(Chord chord, int n)
      Create a melody consisting of a specified number of repetitions of the given Chord.
      static java.lang.String ConvertToCode.toCode(Chord c, Scale scale)
      Convert a Chord to code in the form of a single integer (if the chord's single note is part of the scale), a call to the Composer class's Composer.n(int...) method (if all of the chord's multiple notes belong to the scale), or the Composer class's Composer.an(int...) method (if any of the chord's notes do not belong to the scale.)
      Chord Composer.xn(int octave, Chord orig)
      Shift the octave of a note/chord.
